last_episode_to_air.name: The End of the Galaxy
last_episode_to_air.overview: Wander and Sylvia lead a band of rebels in a final stand against Dominator while Lord Hater rushes to conquer a planet.

name: Wander Over Yonder
overview: The adventures of Wander, an eternally-optimistic intergalactic traveler and constant do-gooder, and his quick-tempered but loyal steed and best friend, Sylvia.  The friendliest face in outer space, Wander journeys across the galaxies to spread good cheer and to help anyone he can — much to his overly pragmatic stallion’s chagrin. Their fun-loving escapades often lead them to clash with the evil villain Lord Hater and his army of Watchdogs, who travel from planet to planet trying to make hate the order of the day. Together, the best friends travel through the cosmos, happening upon one freewheeling adventure after another and making new friends and foes.

episodes.name: The Greatest
episodes.overview: Lord Hater sets out to control and win everything in the universe, including conquering The Binglebops and their planet, but his plans are soon diverted when he finds himself accepting Wander's series of challenges to prove once and for all that he truly is the greatest in the entire galaxy.

episodes.name: The Egg
episodes.overview: Wander and Sylvia try to soften the heart of a ferocious flying dragon by reuniting it with its lost egg, but it's Sylvia who ends up needing a lesson or two on being gentle and nurturing.

episodes.name: The Picnic
episodes.overview: Wander discovers the perfect spot for his celestial picnic - right next to Lord Hater's epic battlefield, making it extremely difficult for Hater to focus on his battle against archenemy Emperor Awesome for ultimate cosmic power.

episodes.name: The Fugitives
episodes.overview: Wander and Sylvia are trying to escape from Lord Hater's minions and get off the planet but Sylvia's plans can't overcome Wander's need to help others.

episodes.name: The Good Deed
episodes.overview: Wander's usual good deeds at helping anyone in distress suddenly become short-lived when he begins helping for the wrong reason. He and Sylvia work hard to try and fix Wander's mistake.

episodes.name: The Prisoner
episodes.overview: Fed up with Wander's constant botherings, Lord Hater sends Peepers to trick Wander into entering the ship so he can trap him and throw him in the ship's prison. But when Wander starts having a lot of fun, it makes the task extremely difficult for Peepers to succeed.

episodes.name: The Pet
episodes.overview: When Wander and Sylvia board an abandoned spaceship, they encounter a horrifying alien monster that is set on eating them, who Wander names, Captain Tim. While Sylvia sees the wild beast as a threat, Wander takes a liking to the ferocious little monster and tries to train it to be his pet.

episodes.name: The Bad Guy
episodes.overview: Wander and Sylvia run out of orbal juice and crash land on Doomstone, a planet inhabbited by bad guys. Sylvia has Wander act like a bad guy like the others so she can get the juice, but Wander's bad guy attitude winds up going to his head.

episodes.name: The Troll
episodes.overview: While visiting Baaaaa-halla, Wander and Sylvia encounter a mean and greedy troll who's been trying to steal the food for the big feast Prince Cashmere and his goat army are holding. Sylvia is determined to help the goats fight the creature, but Wander doesn't help the right way and sits out.

episodes.name: The Box
episodes.overview: When Wander and Sylvia have to deliver a box to "Glen", Wander has to resist opening the box to find out what's inside even if it drives him mad.

episodes.name: The Hat
episodes.overview: When Wander gets lost on a dangerous planet, Sylvia must learn to trust Wander's magical hat and its mysterious ways, in order to find her buddy before it's too late.

episodes.name: The Little Guy
episodes.overview: Westley, the smallest member of Lord Hater's Watchdog army, accidentally gets left behind during a search for Wander and Sylvia. Westley has Wander and Sylvia as his prisoners so he can return to Lord Hater, but Wander seeks to make him a new friend.

episodes.name: The Bounty
episodes.overview: Due to Commander Peepers' inability to capture Wander and Sylvia, Lord Hater hires three bounty hunters to capture them. This doesn't go well with Commander Peepers who sets out to thwart the bounty hunters and to apprehend Wander and Sylvia for his own glory.

episodes.name: The Ball
episodes.overview: A spa planet's inhabitants are in need of help as each of the planets they move to is destroyed by a space puppy.

episodes.name: The Hero
episodes.overview: With the help of Sir Brad Starlight, Wander sets out to fulfill his fairytale dreams of rescuing a princess.

episodes.name: The Birthday Boy
episodes.overview: During Lord Hater's birthday party, a captured Wander tries to make his birthday a happy one although Hater merely wants to see Wander grovel in fear.

episodes.name: The Nice Guy
episodes.overview: When getting a soda for Sylvia at a hot reststop, Wander finds himself caught between helping others and helping Sylvia.

episodes.name: The Timebomb
episodes.overview: Competing in a galactic race, Wander finds out why Sylvia is called "The Timebomb" by some and works to calm her down.

episodes.name: The Fancy Party
episodes.overview: Lord Hater competes for the affections of an alien queen in order to inherit her army and take over the universe.

episodes.name: The Tourist
episodes.overview: Wander tries to outdo an elder tourist who has seen more of the universe than he has.

episodes.name: The Day
episodes.overview: Sylvia wakes up imprisoned on Lord Hater's ship with a sleeping Wander and must fight to escape.

episodes.name: The Night
episodes.overview: Wander must prevent a sleeping Sylvia from waking up during the night.

episodes.name: The Lonely Planet
episodes.overview: A lonely planet named Janet tries to keep Wander to herself.

episodes.name: The Brainstorm
episodes.overview: Lord Hater and Commander Peepers brainstorm plans to capture Wander and Sylvia.

episodes.name: The Party Animal
episodes.overview: Sylvia tries to stop Emperor Awesome from destroying a planet with his partying and partyloving Wander from joining in the festivities.

episodes.name: The Toddler
episodes.overview: Wander and Sylvia try to return a giant lost baby to its parents, which is complicated by their different parenting methods.

episodes.name: The Epic Quest of Unfathomable Difficulty
episodes.overview: Wander forces Sylvia to go on an epic quest in order to return a lost sock to its owner.

episodes.name: The Void
episodes.overview: When Wander and Sylvia enter a white void where anything is possible through imagination, Sylvia worries Wander may never want to leave.

episodes.name: The Funk
episodes.overview: Lord Hater turns to bullying the universe just to make himself feel better.

episodes.name: The Enemies
episodes.overview: Lord Hater and Sir Brad Starlight team up to fight Wander.

episodes.name: The Liar
episodes.overview: Wander guides a family of alien birds through the perils of an active volcano.

episodes.name: The Stray
episodes.overview: Wander goes out of his way to help a cute little kitten, Little Bits, only to find that she is secretly a bounty hunter luring him into a trap.

episodes.name: The Date
episodes.overview: Wander convinces Sylvia to go on a date with Lord Hater, after he gets stood up.

episodes.name: The Buddies
episodes.overview: Lord Hater gets trapped on his own prison planet and must play the role of Wander's best buddy to survive.

episodes.name: The Gift
episodes.overview: Wander is handing out gifts to every new friend he’s made and sneaks onto Lord Hater’s ship to give him and the Watchdogs gifts.

episodes.name: The Gift II: The Giftening
episodes.overview: When gifts strangely start appearing on Lord Hater's ship, turning their recipients into zombies, Lord Hater and Commander Peepers must escape from whoever is giving the gifts.

episodes.name: The Big Job
episodes.overview: Sylvia is recruited by a rebel commando team to help steal Lord Hater's latest secret weapon.

episodes.name: The Helper
episodes.overview: One strange day, Wander is unable to find anybody who actually needs his help.

episodes.name: The Rider
episodes.overview: When Sylvia's old partner Rider (voiced by Will Arnett) shows up, Wander wonders if the roguish Rider makes a better teammate for Sylvia than he does.

episodes.name: The Greater Hater
episodes.overview: Wander and Sylvia's world is turned upside down with the arrival of a new villain that threatens Lord Hater's status as the Greatest in the Galaxy.

episodes.name: The Big Day
episodes.overview: Lord Hater finally captures Wander and Sylvia.

episodes.name: The Breakfast
episodes.overview: Wander and Hater each struggle in their own way when making breakfast.

episodes.name: The Fremergency Fronfract
episodes.overview: Wander picks up a loopy Lord Hater from the dentist.

episodes.name: The Boy Wander
episodes.overview: Wander heroically faces a ridiculous villain from his past whom no one takes seriously.

episodes.name: The Wanders
episodes.overview: When Wander is split into multiple parts of his personality, Sylvia must decide if there are parts of her pal she can do without.

episodes.name: The Axe
episodes.overview: Lord Hater fires Commander Peepers, who is shocked to find how well Hater does without him.

episodes.name: The Loose Screw
episodes.overview: Wander and Sylvia are stuck between stopping a planetary invasion and helping an elderly lady fix her broken-down ship.

episodes.name: The It
episodes.overview: In order to work his way to the top of the Villain Leaderboard, Lord Hater must try to ignore Wander’s game of interplanetary tag.

episodes.name: The Cool Guy
episodes.overview: Lord Hater ditches Peepers to party with Emperor Awesome.

episodes.name: The Catastrophe
episodes.overview: Sylvia discovers Wander’s new obsession with funny cat videos is part of a more fiendish viral plot.

episodes.name: The Rager
episodes.overview: Wander holds a party for the rulers that Hater locked up, and Hater tries to slip into the party .

episodes.name: The Good Bad Guy
episodes.overview: Hater meets his idol, only to learn that he's become good thanks to Wander. Now, Hater tries to make him evil again.

episodes.name: The Battle Royale
episodes.overview: Wander discovers Dominator is a girl and tries to set her up with Hater.

episodes.name: The Matchmaker
episodes.overview: Sylvia distracts Wander with a series of ridiculous adventures to keep him from delivering Hater’s love letter to Dominator.

episodes.name: The New Toy
episodes.overview: Peepers devises a plan to stop Lord Dominator, but all Hater wants to do is impress her with his sweet new vehicle.

episodes.name: The Black Cube
episodes.overview: Wander convinces a down-on-his-luck villain to spend a day looking on the bright side of things instead of collecting the souls of others.

episodes.name: The Eye on the Skullship
episodes.overview: Andy the Watchdog interviews Lord Hater for his video blog.

episodes.name: The Secret Planet
episodes.overview: Wander makes a white lie that causes some crazy consequences, threatening the planet to be discovered by Lord Dominator.

episodes.name: The Bad Hatter
episodes.overview: Lord Hater steals Wander's hat to impress Lord Dominator.

episodes.name: The Hole...Lotta Nuthin'
episodes.overview: To save the universe, Wander puts his finger into a black hole, plugging it up, but now he's stuck there unless Sylvia can find a replacement for him.

episodes.name: The Show Stopper
episodes.overview: Commander Peepers and Sylvia work together to stop Hater and Wander from singing the same song over and over again to get Dominator's attention.

episodes.name: The Cartoon
episodes.overview: Lord Hater releases a propaganda cartoon on how awesome he is in an attempt to get Lord Dominator's attention.

episodes.name: The Bot
episodes.overview: Dominator sends out one of her bots to get Volcanium X for her, but it get damaged and Wander helps it out in finding the stuff.

episodes.name: The Family Reunion
episodes.overview: Sylvia takes Wander to meet her family, only to reveal she ran away from home.

episodes.name: The Rival
episodes.overview: Lord Hater and Peepers spy on Major Awesome as he tries to get Dominator to be her girlfriend.

episodes.name: My Fair Hatey
episodes.overview: In this special half-hour musical episode, Lord Hater enlists Wander's help to finally ask Dominator on a date.

episodes.name: The Legend
episodes.overview: While rescuing some kids from Lord Dominator, Wander and Sylvia hear tales of their heroics as the kids know them.

episodes.name: The Bad Neighbors
episodes.overview: To hide from Lord Dominator, Hater and his crew move into Suburbia to re-coop, but Hater gets really annoyed with Emperor Awesome, his new neighbor and fights with him.

episodes.name: The Party Poopers
episodes.overview: Wander fights a massive case of the giggles while trying to impress a race of beings with unusual faces.

episodes.name: The Waste of Time
episodes.overview: When Wander and Sylvia accidentally buy Time Orbbles, Sylvia must keep Wander focused or risk being lost in time forever.

episodes.name: The Hot Shot
episodes.overview: When a mysterious new rebel begins fighting Dominator's forces, Sylvia becomes jealous.

episodes.name: The Night Out
episodes.overview: Dominator takes a night off to explore a nearby city and makes an unlikely new friend, Sylvia.

episodes.name: The Search for Captain Tim
episodes.overview: Lord Hater's pet goes missing, and Hater teams up with an archnomorph hunter named Ripoff to find him.

episodes.name: The Heebie Jeebies
episodes.overview: Wander is too scared to think straight as he and Sylvia journey inside a creepy forest to find an ancient power to use against Dominator.

episodes.name: The Sick Day
episodes.overview: After Wander comes down with a cold, he depends on Sylvia to take on his many duties helping others.

episodes.name: The Sky Guy
episodes.overview: Wander discovers an adorable new species and accidentally exposes them to an entire new world.

episodes.name: The Robomechabotatron
episodes.overview: Lord Hater, Peepers, Wander and Sylvia fight over the Robomechabotatron, the universe's great robot protector, to take down Domnitaor.

episodes.name: The Flower
episodes.overview: Sylvia and Wander do everything in their power to restore a flower from all the destruction Dominator brought down to the area.

episodes.name: The End of the Galaxy
episodes.overview: Wander and Sylvia lead a band of rebels in a final stand against Dominator while Lord Hater rushes to conquer a planet.
